answers.answer: Hello.A berry aneurysm can lead to a vascular tinnitus. This is a continuous sound in the ears. It is possible that the humming sound was actually a vascular tinnitus.Is the humming still there now ?Regards
yes the humming has returned since she has been taken off of the pain meds that she was on
Hello.I can not tell you if the humming is in fact related to the pain control or the diabetic status, but I can suggest you one more MRI to confirm if the clipping is successful.Regards

question: My wife just had surgery to clip a berry aneurysm.  She was complaining about humming in her brain that continued to worsen.  Along with headaches a nausau for a period of about 4 months.  She has diabetes and her family Dr. told her that it was just caused by her diabetes.  The humming was the worst just before she developed the bleed in her brain.   Could you tell me if the humming in her brain could have been a sign of the aneurysm developing.The humming stopped after her surgery for a few days.  Her blood sugar level is currently under 100 and her blood pressure is good.Worried
title: What are the early symptoms of a Berry Aneurysm
